project_abstract.cdata: The Rural Communities Development Project will: (a) alleviate rural poverty by carrying out rural investments identified and formulated following a participatory planning process; (b) enhance the institutional capacity of the Secretariat for Rural Development (SNDR), the Small-Farmer Development Fund (FDC), and the Secretariat for Popular Participation (SNPP) to carry out the project; (c) improve the capacity of municipalities and rural communities to implement municipal development plans (PMD); and (d) strengthen non-governmental organizations (NGOs) assisting municipalities and rural communities in identifying, formulating and implementing rural investments and managing their PMDs.
